pkgmetadata.longdescription: # JSON Classes SanicJSON Classes integration with Sanic.## PrerequisitesTo use this package, you should have `jsonclasses` and `sanic` installed.## InstallationInstall `jsonclasses-sanic` with `pip`.```shpip install jsonclasses-sanic```## DocumentationRead on bla bla bla.## License[MIT License](https://github.com/WiosoftCrafts/jsonclasses-sanic/blob/master/LICENSE)
